long_description: With full-color photographs and maps throughout,. Author: David Day. Softcover; 447 pages; color photographs and maps. Rincon Publishing Company; copyright 2009. Each hike lists distance, time, elevation, trail description, best season, vicinity, suggested topo maps and sources of additional information. Detailed directions get you to the trailhead, overview maps help you navigate and clear prose offers an idea of what to expect along the trail. Introductory section contains background information on wildlife, history, and geology, as well as tips for hikers. Features 350 beautiful photographs.
short_description: With full-color photographs and maps throughout, Colorado's Incredible Backcountry Trails leads you off the beaten path throughout the Centennial state.
